heroblade.release_notes:
Release v3.0.1.30929 (LTS)

- Granny was upgraded from version 2.9.7 to 2.11.8.0 (pre-release)

- Real-time version checking was added to the Analysis > Statistics function (Granny, PhysX, DirectX, etc.).

- The crash that occurred when the editor was left open for a long time has been fixed.

- The large number of DLLs and files has been reduced.

- The version control system has been improved.


Release v3.0.1 42054

- Implemented a comprehensive update system for automatic version control

- Unnecessary DLLs and library clutter have been removed

- Integrated Sentry for comprehensive crash reporting in LaniBlade

- Crashrpt has been disabled

- Improved ErrorDialog implementation with better parameter handling

- Enhanced stack trace handling in Browser.cs using StackTrace class directly

- Enhanced Character Support: Updated ValidFilenameCharacter method to allow underscores in valid filename characters

- Unicode Support: Modified tbName_KeyPress to validate characters instead of key codes, supporting Unicode characters during input

- Improved Input Handling: Enhanced key press event handling for proper character validation

- Console Window Control: Changed configuration flag from ENABLE_CONSOLE to ENABLE_CONSOLE_WINDOW for clarity

- Launcher Execution Checks: Introduced configuration flags to enable/disable launcher checks and development bypassG:\LaniEngine\playm2m-build-pipelines\DLL_ANALYSIS_REPORT.txt

- Update System Flags: Added feature flags in BladeDefine.cs and BrowserDefine.cs to enable/disable auto-update functionality

- Deployment Version Checks: Improved logic for allowing execution based on debugger presence and deployment version checks

- Encrypted Releases: Implemented function in HEPlatformInterface for secure release distribution

- Enhanced collision handling and weak_ptr safety in CollideInfo and CollisionSystem

- Enhanced platform interface with new functions for update system

- Fixed console window attachment logic for better development experience

- Resolved tab switching rendering issues in HeroToolForm

- Improved launcher execution validation with better user feedback

- Enhanced error handling in update system for various network scenarios

- Fixed filename validation to properly support Unicode characters

- Improved crash dump handling and configuration settings
